description.narrative: The aim of the project is to enhance the status of women and girls in selected rural communities in Elhassaheisa Locality - Elgezira state. In order to promote and enhance the situation of women and girls the project intends to implement a number of activi ties including training workshops e.g. for women leaders on gender equality women?s rights and legal awareness, establishment of extra curriculum activities at five girls schools, and conducting awareness sessions on women?s health family planning violence against women and women?s role in public life. In addition the project will conduct special campaign on harmful traditional practises namely FGM/C.
